feed.title: Category: conferences | Stefan Adamov on ze web

entry.title: Notes from RailsConf 2014 @ Chicago
entry.content:
A month ago I had the chance to go to RailsConf 2014 in Chicago, thanks to HouseTrip. All I can say is that it was a truly awesome experience. I was able to see some of the giants in the Rails community live and even chat with them (even just for a Gorbypuff sticker )).

Anyway, long story short - I managed to jot down some notes about the talks. You can see them here. This repository also includes notes from my colleague Pedro.
